squidpony.squidmath

Class Bresenham

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidmath.Bresenham

  • public class Bresenham
extends Object
    Provides a means to generate Bresenham lines in 2D and 3D.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com, Lewis Potter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Queue<Point> line2D(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY)
      Generates a 2D Bresenham line between two points.
      static Queue<Point> line2D(Point a, Point b)
      Generates a 2D Bresenham line between two points.
      static Queue<Point3D> line3D(int startx, int starty, int startz, int endx, int endy, int endz)
      Generates a 3D Bresenham line between the given coordinates.
      static Queue<Point3D> line3D(Point3D a, Point3D b)
      Generates a 3D Bresenham line between two points.

      • line2D

        public static Queue<Point> line2D(int startX,
                                  int startY,
                                  int endX,
                                  int endY)
        Generates a 2D Bresenham line between two points.
        Parameters:
        startX - the x coordinate of the starting point
        startY - the y coordinate of the starting point
        endX - the x coordinate of the ending point
        endY - the y coordinate of the ending point
        Returns:

      • line3D

        public static Queue<Point3D> line3D(Point3D a,
                                    Point3D b)
        Generates a 3D Bresenham line between two points.
        Parameters:
        a - Point to start from. This will be the first element of the list
        b - Point to end at. This will be the last element of the list.
        Returns:
        A list of points between a and b.

      • line3D

        public static Queue<Point3D> line3D(int startx,
                                    int starty,
                                    int startz,
                                    int endx,
                                    int endy,
                                    int endz)
        Generates a 3D Bresenham line between the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        startx - the x coordinate of the starting point
        starty - the y coordinate of the starting point
        startz - the z coordinate of the starting point
        endx - the x coordinate of the starting point
        endy - the y coordinate of the starting point
        endz - the z coordinate of the starting point
        Returns:
